name: Dust In The Reel
description:
You're a Spec of Dust, trapped in a VHS tape that is being Rewound. 

Avoid the bigger dust Particles and try to stay Clear of the Reel. How long can you last?

You Can Jump Over the Dust or You Can Push them back. Be careful when pushing them,  they can build up and end up pushing you right into the Reel.

Hope this is somewhat fun, this is my first game and game jam ever.
